backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend canister entry point.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two features: generating a custom clutch plate logo and updating the Header component to display it.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing the single-page automotive repair business website with sections for hero, services, location, contact, and footer.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables defining a warm automotive theme with amber/orange primary colors for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, title, and root div for the Maa Tara Clutch Plate Repairing Center website.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component orchestrating the single-page layout with Header, Hero, Services, Location, Contact sections and Footer.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section displaying phone number, email, and business hours in three card components with icons and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with business summary, quick info list, copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header displaying the clutch plate logo image and business name with tagline in a gradient background.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with headline, service highlights for trucks/buses/cars, hero banner image with error handling, and decorative badge.
Location section with embedded Google Maps iframe and external link button for directions to the shop.
Services grid displaying four service cards (truck, bus, car repair, and leather replacement) with icons, descriptions, and fallback SVG icons on image load errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing ICP backend actor creation with authentication support, using React Query for caching and automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with AuthClient integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm automotive-themed color palette for both light and dark modes using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, container settings, border radius utilities, animations, and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the clutch repair shop website build, including known deployment issues (inaccessible URL, email display problem), completed features, and image requirements.
